text: The great, private - ish romance between Kendall Jenner and NBA player Blake Griffin is essentially over for now, E! and People are reporting via multiple sources. Griffin's trade from the LA Clippers to the Detroit Pistons is mostly to blame. ` ` Kendall and Blake talk and she has been to Detroit to see him, but the distance is a major factor,'' a source told E!. ` ` He will be back in L. A. for the summer, and it's possible they could heat up again. For now, they are still in contact and not ruling anything out.'' ` ` Right now, it's on and off and they still talk and see each other when their schedules allow it,'' a second source said. There's no particular drama to blame
